cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.comment: A refreshing classic with a perfect balance of tangy and salty.
cocktails.recipe: Rub the rim of the glass with lime and dip it in Tajin or salt. Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into the glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned
cocktails.comment: Strong, smooth, and timeless. A whiskey lover's dream.
cocktails.recipe: Muddle the sugar and bitters in a glass. Add ice and pour in bourbon. Stir gently and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: The Carrie Bradshaw AKA the Cosmopolitan
cocktails.comment: Chic and fruity, perfect for a night out!
cocktails.recipe: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.comment: Crisp and dry with a sophisticated edge.
cocktails.recipe: Stir gin and dry vermouth with ice, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.recipe: Stir rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters with ice. Strain into a chilled glass and garnish with a cherry.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.recipe: Stir gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice and garnish with an orange slice.

cocktails.name: Expresso Martini

ingredients.name: oz vodka 0.5 oz coffee liqueur (like Kahlúa) 1 oz freshly brewed espresso (chilled) 0.5 oz simple syrup (optional, for sweetness) Ice (for shaking) 3 coffee beans (for garnish)

cocktails.recipe: 2 oz vodka 0.5 oz coffee liqueur (like Kahlúa) 1 oz freshly brewed espresso (chilled) 0.5 oz simple syrup (optional, for sweetness) Ice (for shaking) 3 coffee beans (for garnish)
